summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3568, for the improvement of the alley in block 8, University Heights Addition, being the alley between University Way and Brooklyn Avenue, from East 45th Street to East 47th Street, under Ordinance No. 44693, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
